tool.name: FPStep3
tool.description: Per-sample metagenome functional profiles based on the predicted functions for each study sequence.

param.name: input_biom
param.label: Biom file
param.help: The abundance table of OTUs used in FPStep1 (format: biom).

param.name: function
param.label: Function file
param.help: Copy number table of gene families/functions present in the predicted genome for each amplicon sequence variant (output of FPStep2 : FPStep2_predicted_functions.tsv).

param.name: marker
param.label: Marker file
param.help: Table of predicted marker copy number (output of FPStep2 : marker_nsti_predicted.tsv).

param.name: description
param.label: Folder of descriptions functions files
param.help: In order to add a description columns to the function abundance table (perform automatically)

validator.message: A built-in database is not available

param.name: max_nsti
param.label: NSTI cut-off
param.help: Sequences with NSTI values above this value will be excluded (default: 2)

param.name: min_reads
param.label: Minimum number of reads accross all samples
param.help: Minimum number of reads across all samples for each input OTU. OTUs below this cut-off will be counted as part of the "RARE" category in the stratified output (default: 1).

param.name: min_samples
param.label: Minimum number of samples to keep an OTU.
param.help: Minimum number of samples that an OTU needs to be identified within. OTUs below this cut-off will be counted as part of the "RARE" category in the stratified output (default: 1).

param.name: strat
param.label: Do you want also a table stratified per sequences ?
param.help: Output table stratified by sequences as well.

tool.help:
.. image:: ./static/images/FROGS_logo.png :height: 144 :width: 110
.. class:: infomark page-header h2
What it does
Prediction of functional abundances based solely on the sequences of marker genes with PICRUSt2 <https://github.com/picrust/picrust2>.
The third step of Picrust2 determine the gene families abundances for each sample.
Inputs/Outputs
.. class:: h3
Inputs
**Biom file**:
The OTUs biom file used in FPStep1. (format `biom1 <http://biom-format.org/documentation/format_versions/biom-1.0.html>`_).
**Function file**:
The table of predicted marker gene copy numbers per study sequence in input tree. (FPStep2_predicted_functions.tsv)
**Marker file**:
The table with predicted abundances per study sequence in input tree. (FPStep2: marker_nsti_predicted.tsv)
.. class:: h3
Outputs
**Function abundance file**:
Output file for metagenome abundances predictions of gene families. (FPStep3_pred_metagenome_unstrat.tsv)
If stratified option is activate, the abundances predictions are done for each OTU, in order to see the contribution of each OTU within each sample. ( Warning, the file produced may be heavy. )
(FPStep3_pred_metagenome_contrib.tsv)
**Seqtab normalized file**:
Output file with abundance normalized. (FPStep3_seqtab_norm.tsv)
**Weighted nsti file**:
Output file with average nsti calculated per sample.
.. class:: infomark page-header h2
